website_summaries.verdict: The Little America backpack is a popular Herschel bag that pairs a mountaineering style with modern functionality. Perfect for a hike or a trip to the office, this bag comes in many colors to suit anyone's style.
pros: We love the super soft padding on the back and the arm straps
Stylish and practical, this bag can carry a good amount of weight and has ample room for textbooks and your laptop
Air mesh back padding helps breathe
cons: There aren't a huge amount of pockets, which can make it difficult to keep your items organized in the main pouch

customer_reviews.title: Authenticity Heads Up
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to buy this after previous reviews but was desperate for the prime shipping and took my chances. Thank goodness I did! Authenticity wise- make sure on the right hand side of the screen that it says sold through Amazon fulfilled by Amazon. It’s when it says “sold by” and anything other than Amazon that you roll the dice on getting a fake bag. Amazon has a partnership with Herschel but other sellers do not. (The broke college student I am reached out to Herschel to make sure I wasn’t getting scammed but happy to pass along help if I can!) Bag wise though the quality is great and I can’t wait to put it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey03

customer_reviews.title: Quality issue
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this backpack a couple of times this past month and already noticed a quality issue. The leather strap near the buckle is already breaking and I've never adjusted the strap. I already passed my 30 day return date and now, I'm stuck with a defective bag with no way to contact the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: Excited but then...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my backpack! The color and size came out as expected, beautiful! BUT the more I looked at it, I saw there was a scuff/peeling mark on the left bottom strap, and the top straps were crooked and going left instead of straight up and down no matter how I angled them or tried to straighten. The holder for the left strap was clearly sewn crooked which contributing to the crookedness. There is a tiny hole on the fabric. There is a stain on the back. I don't care if I'm being nitpicky. For $100 wtf is this??? I asked for a replacement, so we shall see!
customer_reviews.author: Yohannah

customer_reviews.title: (I got the bright blue one) -cute -inner pockets -good emergency pillow -mainstream -fuzzy laptop case -padded like crazy CONS -
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -rare color! (I got the bright blue one) -cute -inner pockets -good emergency pillow -mainstream -fuzzy laptop case -padded like crazy CONS -everyone and their mom has this backpack -front small pocket is annoying to access because of the unnecessary fake straps. It already has a zipper so what's the point other than aesthetic? -can't use iron on patches. I have a few I want to use, but I don't have a sewing machine that's strong enough to pierce through both backpack and patch. -the string inside to tighten the opening gets worn out pretty fast. It's already fraying and I'm waiting for it to snap.
customer_reviews.author: Luca Mak

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Here’s a little story, I first ordered a different color (now I have a Wine) and I got a completely different Hershel backpack. It is black and small; I submitted a claim and they sent a new one, the correct one. Even though I was a little bit mad. When I got the new one, I was so happy. This backpack is peeeeeerfect for backpacking trips, its not too big or too small. I wish it could be waterproof or water resistanr but with a waterproofing spray is ok for the mkment.
customer_reviews.author: Ambar

customer_reviews.title: Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: Fabric feels and looks great. I love the wine red color and the sharp contrast with the tan leather. Inside lining of white and red pinstripes go well. Overall, the bag is well-made and good for a short trip or daily commute. I particularly enjoy how the laptop sleeve is well-padded and slightly elevated from the ground. I only rate it a four star b/c I wish they had a separate sleeve on the side to carry a bottle. It would have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Abhirup Das

customer_reviews.title: Came stained
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought this bag everything was great. The draw string gave out on my after about a year though so I’m buying another. This time though, it came with a stain....
customer_reviews.author: GlenBradley

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, Chic, Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My first impressions: WOW! So much SPACE! I own a 17" ASUS Gaming laptop, with a bulky charger, and a mouse I carry with me everywhere I go when I need to use a laptop, and wow! This backpack held all of that. I first decided to purchase this backpack from seeing other people where it at school. It looks chic, and it goes with almost any outfit! The material it is made out of is high quality. I even received some compliments while wearing this backpack on my campus. I made the right investment.
customer_reviews.author: Erfan223

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Not very functional. If you like a big bag with no storage/organization pockets then you will love this bag. I however like my bags to have some sore of built in organizing pockets. I did not like the drawstring pull shut. I really just didn't like this bag. Its difficult to quickly access anything, no water bottle holder or easy access pouch. However my husband love his. So it's personal preference. It did hold up well and wears well and is durable, and packs alot in it. 4 stars because I wish it had more pockets but it has everything as described and was an authentic bag with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack - had to write a review
customer_reviews.text: The 17L backpack is PERFECT. I've spent countless hours this past week searching for a backpack to carry around all of my things during the school day and this one takes the cake. I was a little skeptical at first because I like having some pockets to keep my smaller items from getting lost in the bag, but besides the small front packet, there are two small pockets inside on each side! I'm able to fit my 11" laptop, 30oz water bottle, some books, snacks, wallet, keys and there's room for more. I've already got so many compliments on it. 100% recommend if you're tired of using a stuffed pocketbook like I was before I switched over
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this backpack, it is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I paid a good penny for this backpack and I have been only using it for barely 5 months. I only carry my laptop, iPad, and planner so it's not like I'm carrying lots of things. I also don't pull hard on the drawstring, however, the backpack has managed to rip in 2 different places now. I've heard so many good things about Herschel, so I was really looking forward to using it but it seems like these bags are not durable. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Presh A

customer_reviews.title: $O CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: this backpack isn't what you would expect for 100.00 Dollar Bag, i Have it for just a few days and my Industry Standard 15.6" Laptop has ripped the internal compartment Because it is made to tight, 15.6 Inch is STANDARD Fifteen Inch Laptop Buckles Are Cheap And there is little room reserved fro organization, A discounted replacement would be well in order The carrier Left it at an address When they were instructed to hold weekend delivery, Guess We're just gonna have to carry it for now At least i'v Been able to accessorize it to look nice .
customer_reviews.author: עכן ה​

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Poor quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked out this back pack and loved it. Great style. Easy to pack. After 2 1/2 months the seam near the handle ripped and the handle and one of the shoulder straps are falling off. I purchased this brand because of the great reviews. It was more expensive than others we looked at but I expected it to last at least 1 school year. Very disappointing. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Strap ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my 9th grader. After she used it for one week, under normal use, the shoulder strap ripped away from the bag. Amazon replaced it with no hesitation (the return policy is always gracious for legitimate returns). However, after 1 week of use, the exact same should strap ripped away again. I have had the same Herschel bag for years that I use for travel and 3 times a week for a gym bag. It seems durable and has held up well. Not sure what's going on with this particular one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for commuters
customer_reviews.text: I should say that I have a two mile walk round trip to and from work. First, this pack is heavy. Maybe it needs to be in order to protect a laptop. Second, it's already falling apart and it's less than six months old. The top loop has already torn off and the left shoulder strap is about to tear away completely. I'm researching sturdier work bags to replace it. It may work for people who just walk a few feet from the parking lot to the building, but not for city folk using public transport.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Babiarz

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, I recommend getting it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good backpack, haven’t had it for long to be able to comment on durability, but I have used it as “personal item/laptop bag” for international traveling and got no complaints for its size by airline companies (big relief on that matter...). It is narrow, but has depth that allows you to fit a lot of stuff if you stack them upon each other. Color was just like photo, and it seems to be authentic (tags etc were as expected). Great buy, if you think it’s 30$ less than what priced on Herschel website.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, needs more pockets
customer_reviews.text: The quality craftsmanship is worth the three stars. However, it only has the pocket for your laptop and a small front pocket. Otherwise all your stuff is piled into the large pocket next to your laptop. It would have benefited from a few more interior pockets for ease of finding keys, maybe holding a tablet or video game system and phone pocket. When I travel I like to carry a few things in my backpack, without having to jam them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Finn

customer_reviews.title: Good for school, not as much for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I like the looks of it. The only thing I do not really like is that there are not enough internal pockets and sub-compartments. I travel a lot and when I am on a long trip, I like to use my backpack as a day pack with everything I need in its own place. That does not work well here. Just two small pockets inside. If you will just have a few books and a laptop, then this should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I just received this backpack and talk about quality. . Haven’t use it yet but looks really nice. What is so great about that it is so light.it Also one important feature on this bag is the light color pink inside. As you can see things easily. I was looking for a backpack that is not heavy yet can hold a lot and not bulky. This looks to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shahrzad M

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful, has a lot of capacity and plush straps. I appreciate that I can fit my whole 15 inch laptop in the back pocket and that it uses magnets to fasten the straps rather than actual buckles. There are two small interior pockets along the sides, pretty far down, which took me awhile to find! My only complaint is that my bag is a magnet for dust and animal fur, so it is very difficult to keep my black bag looking sharp. However, I can easily see myself buying more of these bags in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bobbity

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Comfort - Cuts at the neck and the cloth is hard - not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it whatsoever. Sent it back when my girlfriend noticed it was cutting into her neckline. It rides too high despite strap adjustments and she's fairly tall. It's almost comically big in terms of the straps. The usage of it is also limited. No side pocket and the 15" Laptop sleeve - guess what? - doesn't even fit a 15" laptop LOL. This is a great looking bag, but for $108 after taxes, a complete and utter fail. I would not recommend it to my enemy.
customer_reviews.author: TraviSS

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Works wel., but the brown pleather strap has started to break on the top latching part, so will have to find a way to repair the damage. I'm not sure why it's cracked/breaking in that one place, as it hasn't really been tugged on or anything. I travel between three campuses, so it holds a 13" MacBook air, organizer and other things well. It's lightweight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: crew_girl681

customer_reviews.title: Strap is ripped after one month!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this backpack to carry my 13” MBP, and some notebooks. Was looking for exactly this small profile. Felt the padding was adequate and felt sturdy. However after a little over a month of use, one of the side straps, that slides to adjust the pack on back, is fraying very badly. It’s going to to rip and make the bag unuseable! Very frustrating that has happened days after my return window closed - so I’ve paid this $$ for a month backpack. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: NYRA

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect bag for air travel and weekend and day trips
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is 1 of 3 Herschel products I own. Inbaougt this backpack for a 3 month stay in Germany. It was the perfect bag for air travel and weekend and day trips. I easily fit a couple outfits, toiletry bag, apple 13 inch laptop, travel neck pillow, and Herschel zipper pouch with cords and iPad. It’s comfortable even after wearing it while walking around a city for 7 hours. I’m super pleased with the qaulity and will continue to order Herschel products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wise

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. Won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack straps, super comfy and easy to adjust. Has a compartment for the laptop that gives it an extra cushion which is great! I travelled internationally and fits perfectly as a personal item & you can fit quite a bit in the bag. The front pouch is secured by zipper and buckles! Felt safe walking around and not thinking it would get opened without being able to feel it. Highly recommend this bag for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie chavira

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I love the look. Pros: It holds a lot and it’s cute. Cons: There’s no spot for your water bottle, the compartments aren’t that helpful, and overall it was just a simple bag that wasn’t that comfortable. I switched to a North Face bag about a month after I purchased this one. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: hbm

customer_reviews.title: Great Durability. 9 Years Later & Still Kickin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 9 years ago and still use it all of the time. It’s in excellent condition. The durability is worth every penny. The padded laptop sleeve is still soft and sturdy even after throwing it in the washing machine a few times. A friend even borrowed it for a hiking trip after I used it in college for years. It’s definitely got a lot of miles on it and has held up incredibly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gaertner

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Popular for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: Was reluctant to spend the money on this. These bags are so popular, I felt kind of silly getting the same pack i see everyone walking around with, but it’s honestly worth the money. It’s comfortable to walk in (I usually walk home from work which is 50 minutes and it’s comfortable the whole time) the lining for electronics is very nice. The straps aren’t a hassle like I thought they’d be. It’s very well made. It fits everything I need As a commuter (shoes, lunch, thermos, and more). I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Adriane!

customer_reviews.title: 5 months later and still Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for about 5 months now and still use it everyday for work(pics are after months of use). The space is truly amazing, my work laptop, lunch, purse and all other necessities are able to be in the bag all at once without it being over filled and heavy.. the padding on the inside works great for long wear.. still looks the same as the first day I bought it..( could be because I take really great care of my things but also it’s very high quality material).. I always get compliments on my bag and the love is still strong months later.. a must have for the everyday work commute or school
customer_reviews.author: HelenNikolee

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic closures stop working after 6 weeks of light use
customer_reviews.text: I love Herschel products but I’m very disappointed in this backpack as the magnetic closures on the large flap stopped working within 6 weeks of using the bag. Of course, it’s too late to return the backpack so I’m stuck with it. So annoying! Also, the size is deceiving; it looks like it would hold a lot but it really doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype:/
customer_reviews.text: I got the geo print of this backpack and I was super excited when it came in. But after one week of using it, the metal part that holds both magnets together broke apart. I read so many reviews how study this back pack was & I was so sold how many people loved it. But when the magnet buttons broke instantly after I opened my backpack, I knew that this backpack was going to be just another failure. I still love how sturdy the fabric is and how well it holds in heavy rain when I walk to school, but overall, I'm so disappointed how one button can affect the way my backpack closes now.
customer_reviews.author: Jam Macabugao

customer_reviews.title: Stylish work/casual backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish bag for a semi-professional setting. I use it every day for my lap top to get to work, and have traveled with it several times. Holds quite a bit. Only complaint is for another pocket for internal organization. Things tend to get lost at the bottom of the bag. Quality is good and the bag gets lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This hershel backpack is so cute and perfect size for college and high school. There is a spot perfect for your laptop and an area for your books. The inside is red which is a cute detail that makes the bag even nicer. I ordered the light grey backpack and love it so much. I would really recommend buying it even though it is expensive I can tell that It will last me all throughout college and hopefully after college. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: shahla sedgh

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, cool and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a replacement for my Northface backpack, and was worried that I wouldn’t find anything nice looking that had the same size. This is as big, if not a bit bigger (taller) than my old pack. It doesn’t have as many inner pockets, which is a bit of a bummer, but I do like the well-padded laptop slot and the fact that the front pocket has a zipper under the buckles. I haven’t seen how well it holds up in the rain yet, but I hear these bags are pretty rugged. I like it a lot so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rad AstronautTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: The stitching from the plastic to the fabric can get worn if not taken care of well.
customer_reviews.text: For the month I've had using it for college, traveling through multiple buses to and from work, school, and home, it kept its shape and the fabrics are undamaged. It is honestly a great product, and if you're mindful and continuously take care of it I can guarantee you will continue having a great working backpack for whatever your daily needs are. The only CONS I might say are just the magnetic clips are a bit strong and require, in my opinion, a short awkward movement to open the bag, but honestly, it's not that bad at all and the bag is a well known and fashionable brand so it still a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Inzuzna

customer_reviews.title: was a nice bag, until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I have a 5-star review. After less than a month of use, one of the magnetic clasps for the main compartment broke. It just broke in half. Not under heavy use or an unusual circumstance. Now that side won’t close at all. This bag is now useless. The return window for this vendor was less than 30 days, so unless I call Herschel direct, I’m stuck with a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very versatile. I mostly use it for school as a college student. There’s a divider, which I assume is for a laptop, on the inside of the backpack. I use the divider to separate other things such as notebooks. I also use this backpack for small two day trips. Packing clothes in this backpack can be tough but I’ve never had too much of a problem with it. The mid size is perfect because I have a black regular size little america backpack and I never fully use up all the space.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Did not last more than a month and magnets stopped working... don’t waste your money also the inner lining tore off from the bag. Horrible purchase would never recommend anyone. If I pay 100$ for a backpack I expect something of that price point to last me for years. The magnets completely lost their magnetism and the bag is practically un-useable
customer_reviews.author: Hany Fahmy

customer_reviews.title: nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, well-made backpack. It's composed of a thick, scratch-resistant, water-repelling canvas material that will last for a very long time. The only change I would make is the opening at the top. I'ts a very deep bag, and it's very difficult to reach down to the bottom. Perhaps a zipper on the sides or some elastic give would make loading and unloading that much easier. But besides that challenge, it's well worth the money and you'll enjoy this backpack for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: savvy_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fake products !
customer_reviews.text: So so disappointed. This is my third Herschel bag and the only one I have bought online. First it says there is a headphone peephole, which is missing. Then there is the inner lining of the bag which is completely falling apart ! I have been raving about these bags, and this one was a gift, and it is so disappointing for it to have turned out this way. Wish I could rate it lower than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Paavani S.

customer_reviews.title: It does not store as much as i would like it to
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag on sale, and it is 'okay'. Definitely bought it for the "HERSCHEL SUPPLY CO." branding. It does not store as much as i would like it to, but then again, this is not exactly a hiking backpack-- just looks like one. It has a sleeve for the smaller macbook air or similar and headphone hole on one side. You'll look cool with this but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: A1PrimeReviews

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and High Style
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very high quality, you can tell just by holding it in person and examining the workmanship. It is also really stylish and looks great on. My 10 year old got it for school this year and loves it so far. No problems, only praise! If anything comes up I’ll make sure to update.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Grantham

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Loving this bag, spent a lot of time deciding which one to get and wondering if this would be too big for my 5 ft frame; it is not; comfortable back & straps, simple etc. I was able to tightly slide my old 15" mac book pro into the sleeve as well; am very glad I didn't get anything smaller as I have already found this loaded up and full coming home from the gym, etc!
customer_reviews.author: julesj66

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack I’ve Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this backpack. One of the issues I had with my old backpack was that it always felt heavy due to my laptop. I could have a planner and laptop in their and it would still weigh the backpack down. This backpack holds my laptop and much more and it feels so light. I love the support this backpack has with the padding on the back and straps. My backpack is statement piece for me. I get tons of compliments on the print all the time. Herschel has a forever customer now!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Son's schoolbag
customer_reviews.text: Since his locker wasn't working I decided to get him another bag, since I have a hershel I went with this design. It hold a 13 inch laptop and a decent amount of space for a 7th grader. Held about 7 five star folders, 6 marble notebooks and one binder. give or take.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. RoRod

customer_reviews.title: The last backpack you’ll ever need.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eyes on this bag for years and I finally got it! It’s super comfortable, lots of storage, and I love the lined laptop slot! This is a bag that will never go out of style! I’m honestly overly cautious with it at school because it’s so slick and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Backpack sold by Karen Brow is a fake. If you're willing to buy a fake Herschel for $70ish than it's worth it, but the quality is not as good and the stitching is a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Jflo17

customer_reviews.title: Great for School
customer_reviews.text: I am a Doctoral Student and I have a lot of heavy books, plus my computer. This backpack is perfect for me. I get a lot of compliments on it. It goes with every outfit that I have worn to class.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Fake fake fake! Stitching is horrible and tag was literally sewn on upside down. Shopped and sold by Amazon too so there's no fail safe with that. Will be returning. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shaelyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great looking & feeling. Just needs more pockets
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful backpack. I only gave 4 stars because I just wish it had more pockets. It’s a cool looking bag tho. The straps have snaps so easy in and out. Zipper pouch in front is handy just wish there were more. I love the lining. It’s like opening a present every time I open it with the white and red stripes. Looks exactly like pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves his Herschel backpack. He had one all through high school and needed a new one for college. One year down and it still looks great. Highly recommend for your college bound freshman that needs a cool backpack for their laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: As pictured. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Sold by and shipped from Amazon. Tags, quality, interior lining, all features are as expected. Beautiful bag.
customer_reviews.author: 5ft3naquarter

customer_reviews.title: great bag for students
customer_reviews.text: perfect bag for a high school student. I used it for school to carry multiple books, binders, lunch, and my laptop. it held everything perfectly and the straps had a lot of padding to make it comfortable. I wish the pockets on the inside were bigger. overall a great and durable bag that I plan to continue using for school
customer_reviews.author: BetteC

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a month
customer_reviews.text: Only utilized for less than a month and the magnetic button has already broken off, and of course unable to return or exchange after buying it on Amazon since there is a limited time to do so
customer_reviews.author: SGM

customer_reviews.title: Cool backpack but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was very nice, got a lot of compliments. The only reason I had to give it 3 stars is the poor build quality. The tie string was loose and the stitching was coming apart after only a week of use. It was nice but it definitely won’t last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Solis

customer_reviews.title: Well Built & Worth The Extra Cost
customer_reviews.text: Herschel bags tend to be a little pricey, but they do seem to be built more solidly than the average ones. I've been very pleased with this backpack. It's somewhat larger than I had pictured-- even though the specs are plainly listed, but that's fine for my purposes. It feels like it will last and will likely buy their other products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rains

customer_reviews.title: My ideal backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a backpack to use for this upcoming year and I knew that I wanted a big bag so the Little America was ideal. However, I was browsing all the styles and colors but none of them really "captured" my attention. But then I found a picture of this bag and I just had to know what it was called. I finally found it and now that I have it I think it is completely worth it. The inside of the bag is gray instead of the signature white and red stripes and gray stripes on the straps for the flaps and I would say that this is my ideal backpack in both comfort, look, and size.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Best bag I have ever bought. Worth every dollar. Can easily fit my 15in laptop, charger, pair of shoes, toiletries, and two pairs of clothes. Very deep bag, great for the occasional overnight business trip and don’t want to take two bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bag! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I am SO very happy with this bag. The size is perfect. It comfortably fits my 15.4" MacBook Pro and I still have tons of room to spare. I wore it for a few hours today (01/20/16) in all this crazy snow we're getting in Washington, DC and none of my clothing or belongings inside got even a little wet. It really looks nice in person too. The only downside I can even think of is that I wish the inside were black or grey, but that is really just me nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good looking. My son loves it and he finally has enough room for all his school stuff. I'll probably get one for myself in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: NDVDUAL

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack, however, my son has been using it for one month, and the snap has already broken on the main compartment. I’m so disappointed! I’m going to try to take it to a tailor to get fixed. I bought this backpack because I heard that they were sturdier than other backpacks and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Francine McElwee

customer_reviews.title: If You Value Style More than Function
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most functional nor durable backpack. It's narrow and tall with one small front pocket. But what it has going for it is style. It looks great, and for school use or for casual outings, it does a fine job. The best part of the Little America is the soft laptop pocket inside the main compartment. Since I don't usually carry a laptop, I use that for holding other things like my phone and wallet. If you are willing sacrifice functionality and ruggedness for some style, this is for you since they come in a variety of color combinations.
customer_reviews.author: DHK

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter who commutes on public transportation in New York City. She needed something to alleviate the back pain from carrying a heavy tote with all her work "essentials". I was skeptical that it would feel just as heavy as the tote that my daughter was lugging back & forth to work but this backpack is magical! It distributes the weight so evenly that you don't even realize it's on your back! I highly recommend this backpack! My daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Darnay Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Strap Snapped
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fairly expensive backpack for less than a year and one of the two main straps that keep the backpack together has already snapped. I don’t carry anything heavy in the bag, or use it for any extraordinary circumstances outside of carrying books to class. Pretty upset with this as I thought Herschel made quality bags.
customer_reviews.author: sega7443

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for when you're going on a two day ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect backpack for when you're going on a two day trip and your wife runs out of room in her three luggage for her hair-care products, curling iron, hair straightener, shark steamer, and lint rollers. Paddded laptop sleeve is perfect for your D&D rule book and zippered exterior pocket is perfect for your 20 sided dice.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosC

customer_reviews.title: Great rucksack for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It looks great and it holds a lot of stuff. I do use a packing cube to keep my clothing organized and separate from the other contents. I can fit two days worth of outfits, travel skin care elements, travel sized flat iron, hairbrush, two to three paperback books (or a laptop), mirrorless camera with long lens, and a water bottle. The backpack is comfortable when loaded, but the structured fabric keeps its shape even when its fully packed. I look forward to traveling just so I can use this backpack. My only complaint is the lack of external water bottle pocket for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great look, but kind of small inside.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a little over a month ago since my old backpack gave out. I was really excited to get it but was slightly disappointed with the size. It was a lot smaller than I expected inside. From the outside it appears that the backpack would be huge but its quite the opposite. It is long inside but not wide at all. I do love the color and the padding in the back. Another slight down fall is that some of the stitching is already coming undone, hopefully it does not cause too many issues. I would probably only buy another Herschel if I could see the size inside.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! Initially
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Initially, I had the same color and style, but a larger size. Since the regular one was too big for me and I am clearly not that tall, I traded that one to my brother (since he likes Herschel backpacks too, and he is tall) with money so I can get the same item, but only in a smaller size (mid-volume). When it came, and after opening it, I loved it right away! It was perfect! I bought it months ago, and I am still using this bag now and it's still perfectly fine! I definitely recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: ysabella138

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag for a petite woman
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag and I absolutely love it. I bought it in nave anf it's beautiful. The size is perfect for me, I'm 5ft even. It looks like theres more than enough room to hold the books I would need for classes and my everyday essentials for work. I would have loves a side pocket for a water bottle, but I don't believe herschel makes their bags with the side pocket. Once the semester begins, I'll be back to give a detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: Lanaa

customer_reviews.title: It is more spacious than I thought it was going to be and the lining of the pocket for the laptop is a nice almost velvet like m
customer_reviews.text: This backpack arrived on time and just as pictured online. It is more spacious than I thought it was going to be and the lining of the pocket for the laptop is a nice almost velvet like material that is stiff enough that it feels secure for a laptop to be placed there. The bag is overall in great quality and I was happy with the way it looks as I bought this as a gift for someone and I'm sure they will be pleased with the bag as well. I like it so much I almost considered keeping it for myself lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Legit!
customer_reviews.text: I got a super deal on this bag and I’m super happy with my purchase! It’s totally legit. I bought it for traveling purposes and it fits under the airplane seat when it’s packed to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for my teenage daughter for high school. She really likes it and has received lots of compliments. It is much larger than most other choices out there, so it holds her laptop and all her books.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Lack of compartments, but more than compensates with versatility of use.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the 'Minimalist' vibe this bag has, given the very small amount of pockets it has inside and out. It could really have used a couple extra pouches to store items in in the main compartment, but this is a good bag. It is my go to bag. It can hold many things. MANY things. Or it can old a notebook, pencil, and laptop. Very versatile. For small around the city trips no need to fill it up, but when I travel its the perfect carry on. If my travel is short it even better, because its the only thing I would need to take with me.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but too long.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this backpack. Very hip with the rubber straps and very well made. Problem is that it is a little "tall" for my 5'5" son to use for school - which is why I bought it. Maybe OK for a larger stature person, or to use for travel or other purposes, or for a less picky kid. Just know it's bigger than the standard name-brand backpacks your're used to.
customer_reviews.author: BusyB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a beast! I've had mine for 5 years now and it shows no signs of breaking yet. There is some slight tears in the fabric but that's to be expected for how long I've had it. You can for a ton in this thing and it's a really comfortable backpack. Wish it had a water bottle pocket though. Highly recommend. I'll probably be buying another one shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: It’s real
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I went with the larger size since I have to carry a lot of art supplies. I did a lot of research to make sure it was a real Herschel backpack because I didn’t want it to fall apart. As previous reviews have said make sure it’s from amazon as the supplier.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenager who has a heavy load of books and supplies to carry and she loves it. Attractive, sturdy, very roomy and the magnetic closures are perfect for easy access yet stay closed and secure. The material looks very sturdy as well and although we haven't been out in the rain, it looks sufficiently water resistant. Its not the cheapest backpack but in this case, I do think you get what you pay for and since it is used at least 5 of 7 days, durability is key.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this backpack, might as well get a sack of potatoes for your stuff. If you are buying it for the brand and to be hip, go for it. If you are really looking to invest on a great backpack, don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the candy striper insider fabric
customer_reviews.text: I can find everything I need. All my necessities fit,including my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my little nephew and he likes it. I'd say the colorway is age appropriate, too. Adults can also use the bag, but only during the summers--it's season appropriate. It will make for an excellent vacatin/traveling bag during the summer. The construction is great and sturdy. I did not find any defects (thank goodness, because it was a gift). Looks like the bag will last a few years. I think it is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet charming bag
customer_reviews.text: Hubby bought this bag 6 months ago, is a fairly frequent traveller (long-distance bus/train and plane 3x a week), and the bag still looks like the day he got it! Sturdy build, good stitching, , slight weathered look, quality--but rustic--leather, and definitely worth the splurge to buy the 'nicer' material Herschel sometimes offers on certain bags. Has a nice padded pocket for laptops with a drawstring closure on the top of the bag, and instead of unbuckling the leather straps to access the bag, there are strong snaps to keep the top flap closed.
customer_reviews.author: ELRA12

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter already burned through a backpack for her first year of middle school so I bought her this one. She brings home a ton of heavy books and so far, this is holding up great and weathering all the middle school abuse.
customer_reviews.author: San Clemente Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice style and build!
customer_reviews.text: The design of the backpack is very nice. Definitely stands out in a good way because of it's style. It's very spacious inside which helps with carrying lots of books and it has a laptop sleeve inside with soft material that's so good, you could even clean your screen with. I did personally have an issue with the padding that goes on my back which did not line up well so it was a little uncomfortable to wear the first couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Had this pack for a year. Use it almost everyday. Still looks brand new. Functional and comfortable, relieves some of the weight of my 15” laptop. Relieves lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: vdj

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs a bottle holder
customer_reviews.text: So far looks nice, got it for my middle schooler, she didn’t use it yet. The only disappointment is that it doesn’t have a water bottle holder on the side.. I didn’t realize it didn’t have one during the order.
customer_reviews.author: Emel Artar

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Well Made, Fits Easily
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a work shoulder bag. Super cute, enormous but not in an overwhelming or bulky way. Fits everything and love the laptop sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: rstar646

customer_reviews.title: Matches my wallet I bought after and its awesome. Perfect comfort and I got compliments out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the navy blue and red with brown straps. Matches my wallet I bought after and its awesome. Perfect comfort and I got compliments out of it. Will be looking to buy another (gray and black) in the future since there are many Herschel products I would be able to match that. Recommend to buy from this seller because his item was original and came with the tags it should have when you buy a herschel product.
customer_reviews.author: jayson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s one big bag, if you aren’t filling it completely it hangs like a trash bag, a big ball of stuff in the bottom of a sack. It needs side straps to keep the contents compact and orderly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Buttons broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I am redoing my review. We bought for this school year and several of the buttons already broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling seminary student
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter to use as her backpack when traveling overseas for school. So roomy and she uses it for overnight sleepovers ...perfect, sturdy, light, comfortable and roomy as she often is traveling by bus.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: the product is high quality and just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It is HUGE! I am 5'7 and it covered my whole back and part of my thighs and looked absolutely ridiculous on. However, the product is high quality and just like the picture. I ended up purchasing the mid-volume size and returning this full size.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping101

customer_reviews.title: Nice built bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great just a little to narrow would recommend it if you only need to carry a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and trendy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my son who started High School in Manhattan and walks quite a bit with a heavy bag. He loves it! Very comfortable, great for computer and looks very trendy. Quite popular in NYC. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Morocho

customer_reviews.title: Super cute BUT super huge
customer_reviews.text: AThis bag is super cute and I loved the design and style however the bag itself is HUGE. It just feels very large on unlike other backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the real deal. I bought my own because I was always borrowing my roommate's. It's so spacious and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if possible. Absolutely the worst experience. I ordered this backpack for my trip and received a smaller different style by Hershel where my stuff does not fit. I contacted customer service and they did not care what so ever. Horrible customer service. I'm forced to go to my trip without a backpack. I had to ask multiple times to talk to a supervisor, who wasn't helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Leeja Woldu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female college student and I use this backpack for everything. Although there are two main pockets, it isn't much of an issue for me because it has sooo much space. On a daily basis, I fit my running shoes, toiletries, laptop, change of clothes, pens, lunch, folders, and giant 40 oz water bottle inside. The bag feels durable, is comfy due to the shoulder pads and back cushion, and doesn't weight a lot. It is perfect for going to class or taking a weekend trip. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorja

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month...
customer_reviews.text: So this bag didn't even last a month and the seller Stadium Rack would not offer a refund or exchange. I bought this for school and take text books and a laptop mostly. I bought a $25 bag pack which lasted a whole year. Needless to say, I am very disappointed. If you must buy this bag pick another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pryce

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Received this backpack on Friday and used it for my first day or school today, and It already tore from the side. All I have inside is my small laptop and my charger. There’s no way it would hold my books. I will definitely be contacting the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Natali Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Good but no water bottle pocket
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for books and laptop giving easy access during class. The height also means I can shove a sweater or something on top if needed. The inside pockets work ok for quick access to pencils and pens but they are too deep to easily tell what you grabbing. Also with there was a side pocket for water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Herschel Little America Laptop Backpack
product_meta.description: An iconic silhouette with timeless appeal, the popular little America backpack elevates a classic mountaineering style with modern functionality.
feature_bullets: HERSCHEL COLLECTION: Click on our brand logo at the top of the page to explore the full collection from Herschel Supply.

WARRANTY: We stand behind the quality of our products with a Limited Lifetime Warranty* - our guarantee that every Herschel Supply item is free of material/manufacturing defects. This warranty begins on the date of purchase and covers common/everyday use for the duration of the original purchaser’s lifetime. Herschel Supply’s warranty is only valid on products purchased from authorized retailers. Amazon.com and select Amazon affiliates are the only authorized retailers on Amazon.com.

DURABLE DESIGN: A timeless silhouette inspired by the classic mountaineering style. Sturdy polyester and nylon fabric, made for all adventures. Signature striped liner, drawcord closure and magnet-fastened straps with metal pin buckles. Finished with Herschel’s classic woven label. Spacious, versatile and tech-friendly, the Herschel Little America is suited for both your everyday commutes and your airplane carry-ons.
MEN/WOMEN/UNISEX: The Herschel Little America Backpack was made for everyone. Use it for your commute, the school week, a business trip, or a weekend adventure.
25L CAPACITY: 19.25” high and 11. 25” wide. From your passport to your heavy textbooks, there’s plenty of space to fit everything you need for school, work or travel.

COMFORTABLE CARRYING: Padded, contoured shoulder straps and breathable air mesh back padding, designed for a more supportive and comfortable commute to work or school. The Herschel Little America also makes for the perfect airplane carry-on.

EASY TO ORGANIZE: Multiple compartments for keeping your essentials in place. Front pocket with key clip and hidden zipper, offering anti-theft protection. Tech-safe sleeve is padded and lined with fleece, fits laptops up to 15”. An internal media pocket is the ideal fit for your smartphone, and the additional headphone port is perfect for an on-the-go playlist.
